com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class QueryServerCondenser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.QueryServerCondenser

  • public class QueryServerCondenser
extends java.lang.Object
    Queries an individual Chivalry server. This is somewhat duplicate code of ServerQuery.java. This should really call ServerQuery, but I had issues with making it work. Might try again later.
